net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.handler.event

Interface UiHandlerEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UiHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidget.EventSender, AbstractUiWidgetCollapsableSection.CollapseHandler, AbstractUiWidgetCustomMasterDetail.Handler, UiHandlerEventClick, UiHandlerEventClose, UiHandlerEventCollapse, UiHandlerEventFocus, UiHandlerEventIgnore, UiHandlerEventMode, UiHandlerEventModeVisibility, UiHandlerEventOpen, UiHandlerEventSelection, UiHandlerEventValueChange, UiWidgetCustomField.EventHandlerAdapter

    public interface UiHandlerEvent
extends UiHandler
    This is the interface for a UiHandler that represents an event listener. It receives UiEvents via the action onEvent(UiEvent).
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEvent(UiEvent event)
      This method is invoked for each UiEvent (of any type) fired by the widget.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(UiEvent event)
        This method is invoked for each UiEvent (of any type) fired by the widget.
        Parameters:
        event - is the UiEvent that has been sent.
